service1.title: Code That Yields Solutions
service1.description: Developing interactive and reliable web applications using React and Next.js, with a focus on modern, user-centric design.

service2.title: A Digital Harvest for Sustainable Agriculture
service2.description: Leveraging plant protection expertise to create user-friendly interfaces and intelligent digital tools that enhance farm productivity for a sustainable future.

service3.title: Technology for Earth's Stewardship
service3.description: Applying code to purposeful projects with a commitment to righteous solutions, partnering to contribute to a better and more prosperous future.

contact.title: Are you ready to start your next project with me?
contact.description: Let's collaborate to turn your idea into a tangible reality. Contact me now to get started.

hero.title: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
hero.description1: Seeking Allah's help, I begin my journey as 'Abdulrahman Nashaat,' a Front-End Developer. Allah has blessed me with a passion that combines the mastery of programming and the sciences of agriculture. By the grace of Allah, I possess skills in building modern web applications using React and Next.js, expertise that was deepened during my training at the Information Technology Institute (ITI).
hero.description2: As a student of Plant Protection, Allah has gifted me a love for His earth and an understanding of its challenges. I believe, by Allah's guidance, that technology is a means for the 'cultivation of the Earth' in which He has made us stewards, and agriculture is a fundamental pillar of that.
hero.description3: My mission is to harness the technology my Lord has taught me to serve this blessed sector. I aim to develop beneficial 'AgriTech' solutions that bless the effort and aid farmers and engineers, contributing to the sustainability of our resources and our food security, mindful of the words of the Almighty:
hero.quote: Cooperate with one another in goodness and righteousness, and do not cooperate in sin and transgression.
hero.description4: I ask Allah to open the doors of goodness for me, and to bless me with a righteous work environment where I can offer knowledge that benefits others, and be part of a more prosperous and flourishing agricultural future.

step1.title: Laying the Foundation (Programming)
step1.description: During the first-year college break, I began my journey learning Front-End development and web fundamentals.

step2.title: Refining Skills through Practice
step2.description: Moving from 'learning' to 'application' by building personal and experimental projects, developing practical experience.

step3.title: Defining the Academic Path
step3.description: Starting specialized academic studies in Agricultural Sciences, which opened the door to link technology with agricultural sciences.

step4.title: Intensive Training (ITI)
step4.description: Completed the 'Web Development using React' program (120 hrs) at the Information Technology Institute (ITI) to refine my skills.

step5.title: Towards Professionalism (Next.js & Redux)
step5.description: Completed 'The Ultimate React Course' to learn Next.js, Redux, and advanced development skills.

step6.title: The Current Mission: AgriTech
step6.description: Dedicating acquired skills (programming + agriculture) to develop innovative solutions, striving to achieve the vision mentioned in the summary.

cert1.title: Web Development using React Js (120 hrs)

cert2.title: The Ultimate React Course 2025: React, Next.js, Redux & More

about.title: About Me
about.description: React developer specializing in AgriTech, I aim to merge technology with agriculture to create sustainable and innovative solutions.
